price: Yookiin “odoo Rabbiin na qajeelchee sila warra Rabbiin sodaatan irraan ta’a ture” akka hin jenneef.
arabic: أَوۡ تَقُولَ لَوۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: aw taqūla law anna al-laha hadānī lakuntu mina al-mutaqīna
